com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.styles

Interface BorderHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FormatHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStyleHandler, CellStyleHandler, ColumnRowCellStyleHandler, ColumnRowStyleHandler, DifferentialStyleHandler, NewStyleHandler, OdsStyleHandler, RangeStyleHandler, StyleHandlerImpl

    public interface BorderHandler
extends FormatHandler
    Represents a handler for border formatting which is used to decouple CellBorders and CellBorder types from the border format data in the underlying storage.

    Border formatting has a special handler because borders are dependent on the source of border formatting.

    For example, column / row / cell borders depend on the border of the neighbor column / row / cell (border resolution).

    Similarly, if border is set, adjacent border should be cleared (so it doesn't override set border if it has higher priority in border resolution).

    Cell range has specific behavior regarding borders. All other formatting in cell range is applied to every column / row / cell in the range, but outside borders are applied only to outside columns / rows / cells.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.styles.FormatHandler

        getColors, isDifferential

    • Method Detail

      • getBorderData

        BorderData getBorderData()

        Gets the resolved border formatting.

        Returned value is never null and modifying it won't make any changes in the underlying storage (it is either cached or cloned version of formatting from the underlying storage or it is dynamically created).

        Returns:
        The resolved border formatting.

      • setBorderData

        void setBorderData(BorderData value)

        Sets the border formatting.

        Input value is either cached / frozen or cloned (modifying it later won't make any changes in the underlying storage). Input value can be null, in which case formatting will be resolved from the referenced (named) style.

        Parameters:
        value - The border formatting.

      • getSingleBorderData

        Optional<SingleBorderData> getSingleBorderData(IndividualBorder selector)
        Gets the resolved border based on selector.
        Parameters:
        selector - The selector of the border.
        Returns:
        The resolved border based on selector.

      • getUnresolvedBorderData

        Optional<SingleBorderData> getUnresolvedBorderData(IndividualBorder selector)
        Gets the unresolved (direct) border based on selector.
        Parameters:
        selector - The selector of the border.
        Returns:
        The unresolved (direct) border based on selector.

      • setIndividualBorder

        void setIndividualBorder(IndividualBorder selector,
                         Optional<SingleBorderData> value)
        Sets the specified border using the selector.
        Parameters:
        selector - The border selector.
        value - The border value.

      • setMultipleBorders

        void setMultipleBorders(EnumSet<MultipleBorders> selector,
                        Optional<SingleBorderData> value)
        Sets the specified borders using the selector.
        Parameters:
        selector - The borders selector.
        value - The border value.
